column4: hi I want to use OpenGL with my i810 graphics card. xserver-xorg-driver-i810 is installed and in xorg.conf. however glxinfo says something about mesa opengl which is software rendered IIRC
mesa can be hw accel if you are using free drivers
glxgears runs for a sec then crashes...
OpenGL renderer string: Mesa DRI Intel(R) 915GM 20050225
